use() - Method in class card.minion.Minion
Use the minion card Remove the mana cost of the minion to the player call summon method
use() - Method in class card.spell.Spell
Override of the method use of Card which remove the cost in mana of the spell from the current mana of the player Use cast method
useHeroPower() - Method in class game.Player
Use our hero power only one utilisation per turn the use of the hero power cost 2 mana points
useHeroPower() - Method in class hero.Hero
abstract method useHeroPower
useHeroPower() - Method in class hero.Mage
Override the useHeroPower abstract method of hero Ask the user for the target he want to damage This target can be either the enemy hero or one of the enemy minion If there is no minion on the enemy board the player is asked by default if he want to target the enemy hero This action deal 1 damage to the target
useHeroPower() - Method in class hero.Paladin
Override the useHeroPower abstract method of hero Add one RecrueDeLaMainDArgent minion to the board of the player
useHeroPower() - Method in class hero.Warrior
Override the useHeroPower abstract method of hero The player gain 2 points of armor
